name: Beyond Oasis
description: Beyond Oasis, known in Japan as The Story of Thor: Hikari wo Tsugu Mono (ストーリー オブ トア 〜光を継ぐ者〜, "The Story of Thor: Heir of the Light") and in Europe as The Story of Thor: A Successor of The Light, is a 1994 Action-adventure video game developed by Ancient and published by Sega for the Mega Drive/Genesis console. The game was later re-released to the Wii's Virtual Console on March 19, 2007 in North America, and April 5 the same year in Europe. The game was also included in Sonic's Ultimate Genesis Collection/Sega Mega Drive Ultimate Collection for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3; in the European version of the latter, it is entitled The Story of Thor. In 2017, the game was ported to iOS and Android as part of SEGA's SEGA Forever service.
